name: api_physics_CharacterController
description: A CharacterController allows you to easily do movement constrained by collisions without having to deal with a rigidbody.

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center of the character's capsule relative to the transform's position.

properties.name: collisionFlags
properties.description: What part of the capsule collided with the environment during the last CharacterController.Move call.

properties.name: detectCollisions
properties.description: Determines whether other rigidbodies or character controllers collide with this character controller (by default this is always enabled).

properties.name: enableOverlapRecovery
properties.description: Enables or disables overlap recovery. Used to depenetrate character controllers from static objects when an overlap is detected.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the character's capsule.

properties.name: isGrounded
properties.description: Was the CharacterController touching the ground during the last move?

properties.name: minMoveDistance
properties.description: Gets or sets the minimum move distance of the character controller.

properties.name: radius
properties.description: The radius of the character's capsule.

properties.name: slopeLimit
properties.description: The character controllers slope limit in degrees.

properties.name: stepOffset
properties.description: The character controllers step offset in meters.

properties.name: velocity
properties.description: The current relative velocity of the Character (see notes).
